channel.title: Rushes on tEp
channel.description: Recent content in Rushes on tEp

item.title: Iron tEps: Insect Edition
item.description: Tired of steak and lobster? Come bake and eat some land invertebrates instead.

item.title: Dim Sum
item.description: I’m sure you’ve all heard of Riemann sums, direct sums, wedge sums, free products, and disjoint unions, but have you heard of DIM sum?? Meet at tEp for a lazy Monday afternoon dim sum.

item.title: More oobleck!
item.description: The oobleck’s getting cooler, but the kiddie pool’s getting hotter!

item.title: Oobleck
item.description: 1000 pounds of non-Newtonian fun. Towels and spare clothes provided.

item.title: LN2 Spice Cream
item.description: Spice Cream: Final Showdown. Which spice is best in ice cream? Will it be returning champion Capsaicin or the new challengers Piperin or Cinamalehyde?

item.title: Duck Duck Chili
item.description: Join us on our waddling quest to discover the best Thai food in Boston.

item.title: Bleached T-Shirt Design
item.description: Make your own stenciled and bleach-washed shirt. Caution: Oxidizers (but I…)

item.title: Ganzfelding + Science Smorgasbord
item.description: What do butterflies and 3D printed lattices have in common? Find out! Speaking of radiation…

item.title: Japanese Griller
item.description: Make your own sushi and eat it too!
